title: Regression in downloading compressed files from Cloudflare R2
body:
#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`

n/a

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

Files with `Content-Encoding: gzip` in Cloudflare R2 are no longer being downloaded as a gzip. 


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
‚ûú  ~ rclone version
rclone v1.68.1
- os/version: darwin 14.7 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 23.6.0 (arm64)
- os/type: darwin
- os/arch: arm64 (ARMv8 compatible)
- go/version: go1.23.1
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: none
```


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

macOS 14.7

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

Cloudflare R2 

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

`rclone copy remote:file .`

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

##### Version 1.68.1
```
‚ûú  ~ rclone -vv copy datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220/20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz .
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.68.1" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "copy" "datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220/20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz" "."]
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220/20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz"
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/cole/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : fs cache: adding new entry for parent of "datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220/20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz", "datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220"
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "."
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : fs cache: renaming cache item "." to be canonical "/Users/cole"
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz: Need to transfer - File not found at Destination
2024/10/15 13:47:53 ERROR : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz.ac4748ef.partial: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363
2024/10/15 13:47:53 INFO  : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz.ac4748ef.partial: Removing failed copy
2024/10/15 13:47:53 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz: Need to transfer - File not found at Destination
2024/10/15 13:47:53 ERROR : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz.ac4748ef.partial: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363

2024/10/15 13:47:53 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 1 errors and: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363
2024/10/15 13:47:53 DEBUG : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz: Need to transfer - File not found at Destination
2024/10/15 13:47:53 ERROR : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz.ac4748ef.partial: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363
2024/10/15 13:47:53 INFO  : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz.ac4748ef.partial: Removing failed copy
2024/10/15 13:47:53 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 1 errors and: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363
2024/10/15 13:47:53 INFO  :
Transferred:   	    1.063 KiB / 1.063 KiB, 100%, 0 B/s, ETA -
Errors:                 1 (retrying may help)
Elapsed time:         0.9s

2024/10/15 13:47:53 NOTICE: Failed to copy: corrupted on transfer: sizes differ src(S3 bucket cloudflare-logs path workers_trace_events/20221220) 0 vs dst(Local file system at /Users/cole) 363

##### Version 1.67

```
‚ûú  ~ rclone-v1.67.0-osx-arm64/rclone -vv copy datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220/20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz .
2024/10/15 13:48:32 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.67.0" starting with parameters ["rclone-v1.67.0-osx-arm64/rclone" "-vv" "copy" "datalab-r2:cloudflare-logs/workers_trace_events/20221220/20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz" "."]

2024/10/15 13:48:32 NOTICE: 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz: Not decompressing 'Content-Encoding: gzip' compressed file. Use --s3-decompress to override
2024/10/15 13:48:32 DEBUG : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz: md5 = b256ee4cd80cd6f18bd9a84913fbe2b4 OK
2024/10/15 13:48:32 DEBUG : 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz.cizamiw7.partial: renamed to: 20221220T193149Z_20221220T193219Z_f27449c5.log.gz

<!--- Please keep the note below for others who read your bug report. -->

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the üëç [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
